Thanks alot bro, now i don't have to buy all these at my local comic book shop. They go for like 12 euroes each volume. :)
I'm not sure I understand - issues #67, 70, 71 and 72 aren't CBR files, but RAR archives filled with PNG screenshots. My CBR reader won't support them.
Anybody know when issue 80 is coming out? It's two weeks late!
@Sandizza Just change the file extension to .CBR.  CBR and CBZ files are just RAR and ZIP files respectively with the images inside.
Thanks. Ive got all the comics on paper but sadly they got thrown out by my girlfriend, and they cost loads here so, thanks man. I'll seed for a while.
